name: Irish Fish Producers Organisation
goal: The IFPO works both nationally and Internationally in EU fisheries management for the benefit of our members.
interests: Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: Implementation of Common Fisheries Policy(CFP), Common Organisation of the Markets(CMO). The organisation is in involved in all aspects of the Common fisheries policy and the Common Organisation of the Markets at both local and EU level.
